description._content: [Unidentified sailor in Union uniform] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.7 x 8.8 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-95. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Sailors--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870.
